name: Out Of Memory (Xenon)
description:
Try to avoid being hit by enemies. They will block your ability to shoot. There is no HP bar but there is aaa..... bu..g... umm FEATURE!!! Yes FEATURE TOTALY.

(actual bug description) Game takes out "memory space" with every enemy it spawns. Try to kill the enemies as fast as possible to not overfill the momory. 

If you overfilled the memory you will be able to choose a component to delete in order to play. 

Game was created for Wowie Jam 2.0 !!!

Good Luck Have Fun

WASD - walk

Left Mouse Button - Shoot

Space - change weapons
